http:request.http:headers: #[output application/java --- { "client_secret" : p('smallworld-sapi.client_secret'), "client_id" : p('smallworld-sapi.client_id'), "name": vars.headers_papi.name, "X-CORRELATION-ID": vars.headers_papi."X-CORRELATION-ID", "source": vars.headers_papi.source, "systemId" : vars.headers_papi.systemId }]
